name: Cosmic Fallout
description:
Cosmic Fallout is a game where you are in the middle of a war between aliens and humans, and you must defend the earth from asteroids, nukes, missiles, and UFOs!
Beat your last high score and see how far you can make it!

The game features custom made pixel graphics, a custom soundtrack, and game play that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Take a trip back to the 1980's era of gaming. No tutorials, no story, no hassle. Just jump right in and play!

Compatible with both keyboard and controller.

Movement: A/D | Joystick
Shoot: Click | CTRL | A Button
